ext_descriptions.ext_description: An is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It is the specification of a requirement to control the orientation of a feature.
the datum system that defines the datum reference frame for this .
A is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It is the specification of a requirement to control the runout at each cross section of a circular feature.

the direction in which the runout tolerance is controlled. If the angle is specified, the runout tolerance applies in this angle which is fixed with respect to the datum axis. If the angle is not specified, the runout tolerance applies normal to the surface generated by the rotation.
the datum system that defines the datum reference frame for this geometric tolerance.

A Coaxiality_tolerance is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It specifies a requirement to control the concentricity of a feature to a datum feature.Some tolerancing standards require the use of position tolerance for control of coaxiality.
the datum system that defines the datum reference frame for this geometric tolerance.

A Compound_datum is a type of Datum. It specifies a set of two or more Single_datums of equal importance which are used to establish a single datum plane or axis. A compound datum is in some tolerancing standards called a multiple datum feature or a common datum.
the set of Single_datum objects that form the Compound_datum.
A Concentricity_tolerance is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It specifies a requirement to control the concentricity of a feature to a datum feature.
the datum system that defines the datum reference frame for this geometric tolerance.
A Cylindricity_tolerance is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It specifies a requirement to control the form of a cylindrical feature.
A Datum is a theoretically exact point, straight line, or plane used as a reference for locating and orienting tolerance zones.
the precedence of the Datum.
A Datum_target is the identification of a portion of a feature, that is used in the construction of a Datum. A Datum_target is a component of a Datum_target_set.
the identifier of the Datum_target in a Datum_target_set.

A Datum_target_set is a set of Datum_target objects. Datums are established from a set of datum targets when the use of an entire feature would introduce excessive variations or lack of repeatability in measurements.

the type of datum that is formed by the Datum_target_set. The rule_description 'V-block' indicates that two Datum_target objects on a cylindrical element are supposed to form the areas of contact in a V-shaped fixture.The rule_description need not be specified for a particular Datum_target_set. If present, there shall be exactly one object that defines the rule_description for a Datum_target_set.
the set of Datum_target objects that form the Datum_target_set.
A Flatness_tolerance is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It specifies a requirement to control the flatness of a planar feature.
A Geometric_tolerance is a specification of the allowed deviation of some element of the shape of a product from its theoretically exact shape.
the Shape_element that the Geometric_tolerance is associated to.
the Tolerance_condition that is associated with the application or the Geometric_tolerance.
the word or group of words by which the Geometric_tolerance is referred to.
a text that provides additional information about the Geometric_tolerance. 'not concave', 'boundary' are examples of qualifying note.
a length of a segment that constrains how the tolerance applies. All along any segment of this size, taken on the toleranced element, the toleranced element shall conform to the tolerance.
the number of decimal digits indicating the accuracy of the tolerance value.
the value of the width of the tolerance zone. The meaning of this value will depend on the standard used for the interpretation of the geometric tolerance.
If specified, the segment_size shall be a value of a length measure.
If specified, the tolerance_value shall be a value of a length measure.
If specified, the significant_digits number shall be greater than 0.

A Geometric_tolerance_relationship is a relationship between two instances of Geometric_tolerance.
The meaning of the relationship is specified within the attribute relation_type.
the first of the two objects related by the Geometric_tolerance_relationship. The semantics of this attribute is defined by the attribute relation_type.
the second of the two objects related by the Geometric_tolerance_relationship.The semantics of this attribute is defined by the attribute relation_type.

the meaning of the relationship. Where applicable, the following values shall be used:
precedence: The relating Geometric_tolerance is of higher priority than the related;
simultaneity: The relating and the related Geometric_tolerance shall be met simultaneously, that is, in the same actual datum reference frame.
Other kinds of relation may be specified if appropriate to a particular tolerancing system. The location of a each feature of a pattern of features may be specified with a geometric tolerance, and the relationships between the features in the pattern may be specified by another. A different position tolerance may be specified for each end of a long hole. A Geometric_tolerance_relationship could be used to express that an interpolated value applies at intermediate points, thus creating a conical tolerance zone

A Line_profile_toleranceis a type of Geometric_tolerance. It is the specification of the definition of a uniform boundary along the true profile within which the elements of the toleranced surface shall lie. The tolerance zone established by a Line_profile_tolerance is two dimensional.
a plane which defines the elements to which the tolerance is applied.
the datum system that defines the datum reference frame for this geometric tolerance.
A Parallelism_tolerance is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It specifies a requirement to control that a surface or a curve shall be parallel to a reference datum, with an allowed amount of deviation.
a plane which defines the elements to which the tolerance is applied.
the datum system that defines the datum reference frame for this geometric tolerance.
A Perpendicularity_tolerance is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It specifies a requirement to control the perendicularity of a surface or a curve with respect to a datum plane.
a plane which defines the elements to which the tolerance is applied.
the datum system that defines the datum reference frame for this geometric tolerance.
A Placed_target is a type of Datum_target. It specifies a Datum_target that is represented implicitly by parameters.
the Cartesian_coordinate_space in which the Axis_placement that serves as parameter_reference is defined.
the Axis_placement that the parameters or the Placed_target refer to.

A Position_tolerance is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It specifies a requirement to control the position of a Shape_element that is a feature of size. It can be interpreted either as defining a positional boundary within which the entire feature is permitted to lie, or as defining a tolerance zone within which the centre, axis, or centre plane of the considered Shape_element is permitted to lie.
a plane which defines the elements to which the tolerance is applied.
the datum system that defines the datum reference frame for this geometric tolerance.

A Projection is a type of Tolerance_zone_definition. It specifies a condition where a Tolerance_zone is projected from an element of a part. The projection is external to the part and made from one of the ends of the element for a specified length.
the Shape_element from which the tolerance zone is projected.
the distance from the projection_end where the Geometric_tolerance shall be measured.

A is the specification of a plane that is used to further specify the application of Geometric_tolerance objects.The Reference_plane may be used to specify a projection plane or a family of cutting planes in order to locate a tolerance zone. A straightness tolerance may applt to each linear element in a surface. The reference plane establishes the direction of the elements.
A Roundness_toleranceis a type of Geometric_tolerance. It specifies a requirement to control the form of a circular feature.

A Single_datumis a type of Datum. It specifies a point, line, axis, or plane used as a reference for locating and orienting tolerance zones. A single datum is normally derived from a single datum feature.
the word or group of words by which the Single_datum is referred to.
the Datum_target_set , the Derived_shape_element , or the Shape_element that represents the Single_datum.
a Tolerance_condition that is associated with the application of the Single_datum.
A Straightness_tolerance is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It specifies a requirement to control the straightness of a line.
a plane which defines the elements to which the tolerance is applied.
A Surface_profile_tolerance is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It specifies the requirement to control the profile of a surface.
the datum system that defines the datum reference frame for this geometric tolerance.
A Symmetry_tolerance is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It specifies a requirement to control the symmetry of a feature about a datum.
a plane which defines the elements to which the tolerance is applied.
the datum system that defines the datum reference frame for this geometric tolerance.

A Target_areais a type of Datum_target. It specifies an area bounded by a closed Shape_element. The shape of the Target_area is described explicitly by a set of curves with reference to the part coordinate system.

A Target_circleis a type of Placed_target. It specifies a Datum_target that is defined by an implicit circle. The Datum_targetmay be the area inside the circle or the circle, depending on the geometry. The centre of the circle is specified by the placing Axis_placement. The orientation of the Target_circle is the x-y-plane of the Axis_placement.
the diameter of the datum target.
A Target_pointis a type of Placed_target. It specifies a Datum_target that is defined by a single implicit point. The position of the Target_point is defined by the placing Axis_placement .

A Target_rectangleis a type of Placed_target. It specifies a Datum_target that is defined by an implicit rectangle.
The centre of the rectangle is specified by the placing Axis_placement . The orientation of the Target_rectangle is the x-y-plane with half the length of the rectangle in positive and half the length in negative direction along the x-axis and with half the width of the rectangle in positive and half the width in negative direction along the y-axis of the Axis_placement.
the length of the Target_rectangle.
the width of the Target_rectangle

A Target_straight_lineis a type of Placed_target. It specifies a Datum_target that is defined by an implicit straight line.
The first end point of the Target_line is specified by the placing Axis_placement . The second end point is located on the z-axis of the Axis_placement at the specified distance.

A Tolerance_condition is a specification of the material condition of a feature of size, which is its actual size with respect to its size tolerance.The set of candidate tolerance zones for tolerances with datum_reference depends on the material condition of any referenced datum features of size.The set of candidate tolerance zones of a Position_tolerance depends on the material condition of the toleranced feature of size.
the kind of Tolerance_condition.Maximum material condition (MMC) and least material condition (LMC).
A Tolerance_zone is the specification of the zone wherein all points of the toleranced element shall fall.
the shape of the Tolerance_zone.cylindrical, parallelepiped,or spherical are examples for form_type.
the set of Geometric_tolerance objects for which the Tolerance_zone defines the zone.
A Tolerance_zone_definition is the specification of the set of Geometric_tolerances for which the Tolerance_zone defines the zone.
the Tolerance_zone that is specified by the Tolerance_zone_definition.
the Tolerance_zone that is specified by the Tolerance_zone_definition.
the Shape_element that represents the second bounding element.

A Total_runout_tolerance is a type of Geometric_tolerance. It specifies a requirement to control the runout over a surface with respect to a datum axis the part is rotated about. The tolerance is applied simultaneously to all positions as the part is rotated 360 degrees.
the direction with respect to the datum axis in which a runout tolerance is controlled.
the datum system that defines the datum reference frame for this geometric tolerance.
